description: Identify the reason with the highest percentage of registered voters who did not vote.
Determine the percentage of registered voters who did not vote because they were 'Not interested'.
Order the reasons from the highest to the lowest percentage of registered voters who did not vote.
Calculate the total percentage of registered voters who did not vote due to 'Illness or disability' and 'Too busy, conflicting schedule'.
Find any anomalies in the dataset where the percentage of registered voters not voting is unexpectedly high or low.
Identify if there is any correlation between different reasons and the percentage of registered voters who did not vote.
What is the range of percentages for the different reasons registered voters did not vote?
Identify clusters of reasons with similar percentages of registered voters who did not vote.
What percentage of registered voters did not vote for reasons categorized as 'Other reason'?
Determine the distribution of the percentages of registered voters who did not vote across the different reasons.
